Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Okay I need to come up with 20 open ended questions based on the provided BPMN like process Let me start by understanding the process flow The process starts with market research then RD followed by securing components from different countries There are parallel gateways for sourcing components then shipping to Malaysia assembly quality checks packing shipping via air or sea customs distribution and monitoring inventory

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: First I should think about the rationale behind each step Why are components sourced from specific countries Maybe there are reasons like cost expertise or supply chain reliability Then the parallel gateways for component sourcing whats the benefit of doing them in parallel Maybe to save time or reduce dependencies

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Risk management is important here What if a component from one country is delayed How does the process handle that Also the exclusive gateway for quality checks what criteria are used to decide rework vs scrap How does that affect costs and timelines

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Stakeholder communication How do different teams like RD procurement assembly coordinate What about communication with suppliers in different countries Maybe cultural or time zone differences

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Performance measurement What KPIs are used Lead time defect rates on time delivery How are these tracked

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Potential improvements Could some steps be automated Maybe using AI for demand forecasting Or optimizing the logistics routes

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Decision making Who has the authority to make decisions at each gateway How is data used to inform these decisions

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: I need to make sure the questions are open ended and not yesno Let me brainstorm 1 Why are components sourced from specific countries What factors influence these choices 2 How does the parallel sourcing of components affect the overall timeline and risk 3 What strategies are in place to mitigate delays in component delivery from any single country 4 How is the quality check process standardized across different regions 5 What criteria determine whether a smartphone is reworked or scrapped 6 How does the company balance the cost of rework against the cost of scrap 7 What role does real time data play in adjusting the supply chain during assembly 8 How are customs regulations and compliance managed for different regions 9 What challenges arise from using both air freight and cargo ships and how are they addressed 10 How is inventory monitored to prevent overstocking or shortages in distribution centers 11 What metrics are used to evaluate the effectiveness of the supply chain 12 How does the process handle sudden changes in demand from different markets 13 What communication channels are used between the assembly plant and suppliers 14 How are cultural or logistical differences between countries addressed in the supply chain 15 What innovations could be implemented to improve the efficiency of component sourcing 16 How does the company ensure that all stakeholders are aligned with the process goals 17 What are the environmental impacts of the logistics strategies and how are they mitigated 18 How is the feedback from distribution centers used to adjust future production 19 What are the potential risks of relying on a single assembly plant in Malaysia 20 How does the process adapt to geopolitical changes affecting component suppliers

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Wait thats 20 Let me check if they are all open ended and cover the aspects mentioned rationale improvements risk decision making communication performance Some might need tweaking For example question 10 could be more specific Maybe rephrase some to be more thought provoking Also ensure no SQL queries Looks good
